title.narrative: Secondary Schools & Vocational Training- Education II

description.narrative: The objective of the project is : 1) to establish a Secondary Teacher Training College. 2) of continuing the progress towards full localization of the secondary teaching force.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

description.narrative: Education - administration, policy and planning
